snippet: Mr. Eberts, after trying engineering and banking without success, turned to film and produced gems like “Chariots of Fire,” “Gandhi,” “Dances With Wolves,” “The Killing Fields” and “Watership Down.”
abstract: Jake Eberts, chemical engineer who later became a credited film producer, dies at age 71.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Eberts, after trying engineering and banking without success, turned to film and produced gems like “Chariots of Fire,” “Gandhi,” “Dances With Wolves,” “The Killing Fields” and “Watership Down.”

headline.seo: Jake Eberts, Movie Producer, Dies at 71
headline.main: Jake Eberts, Accidental Film Producer of Oscar Winners, Dies at 71
headline.print_headline: Jake Eberts, Accidental Film Producer, Dies at 71
